H0.text: when was the death penalty reinstated in oregon. 1978

H1.text: when was the death penalty reinstated in oregon. 1965

H2.text: when was the death penalty reinstated in oregon. 1990

H3.text: when was the death penalty reinstated in oregon. 1984

A4.text: Voters reenacted the death penalty in the general election of 1978, by statute; Measure 8 required the death penalty in certain murder cases.

A5.text: In 1984, Measure 6 amended the state constitution to once more make the death penalty legal.
